meanings.definition: It is necessary or proper for someone to do something.
meanings.sent1: In order to succeed, it behoves us to work hard every day.
meanings.sent2: It behoves a student to study diligently for exams.
meanings.sent3: When facing a challenge, it behoves us to stay focused and determined.
meanings.sent4: Just as a seed needs water to grow, it behoves us to nurture our dreams.
meanings.sent5: To reach our goals, it behoves us to take consistent steps forward.

meanings.definition: It is a duty or responsibility for someone to do something.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the behoves of a leader is crucial for effective management.
meanings.sent2: The behoves of a parent include providing love and guidance to their children.
meanings.sent3: Carrying out the behoves of a job with dedication can lead to success.
meanings.sent4: The behoves of a citizen involve contributing positively to society.
meanings.sent5: Recognizing the behoves of a team member is essential for teamwork.
